@graph.caption: A loaf of mint almond wheat bread with the end sliced off

@graph.name: Mint Almond Wheat Bread! - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Mint Almond Wheat Bread. A nice dense bread made with mint and almonds. Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Mint Almond Wheat Bread
@graph.description: Mint Almond Wheat Bread. A nice dense bread made with mint and almonds. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup almonds  ((soaked in warm water for an hour or more))

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the cracked wheat in water for an hour and then Boil the cracked wheat till it softens (3-4 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the cracked wheat in water for an hour and then Boil the cracked wheat till it softens (3-4 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture cool a bit then add Yeast and sugar to it.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture cool a bit then add Yeast and sugar to it.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add the mint leaves, soaked almonds and ginger and blend coarsely. Add some water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add the mint leaves, soaked almonds and ginger and blend coarsely. Add some water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, yeast mixture and mint mixture and 1/2 cup (125ml) of water and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil, yeast mixture and mint mixture and 1/2 cup (125ml) of water and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.
recipeInstructions.name: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.

@graph.keywords: everyday bread recipe, nut bread, vegan bread recipe
